name: Hue Changers beta.version
description:
I want to thank everybody for playing my game when it is in the Beta version.

 I'm going to make regular updates every week and I would be very thankful for any suggestions or bugs that you would find or think of.

Also if you want to donate anything to my game you should know that most likely the game won't be permanently free only the Beta version will be free forever.

Cost of the final version of the game will be equal to  $3,48 so if you donate this or  a bigger amount of money and write your nickname from Itch.io in the donation description you will receive the final version for free when released.
